title: Manage Rig Equipment Certification
description: A rig manager must ensure that all critical lifting and pressure control equipment has valid, up-to-date third-party certifications.

tasks.description: Run a report from the certification management system to identify any equipment with certifications expiring in the next 90 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated listing several pieces of equipment, including the BOP, with upcoming expiration dates.

tasks.description: Schedule a third-party inspector to come to the rig to perform the required inspections and recertify the equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: An inspector is booked for a specific date.

tasks.description: Once the inspection is complete, upload the new certificates into the system and update the expiration dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system is updated with the new certification documents, ensuring the rig remains compliant.
